title: Unlocking the Key Guys for Every Team
description:
Mina and Steven Ruiz of The Ringer choose and discuss who they think will be the non-quarterback x-factors for all 32 teams this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
